features.feature: Update Payment Requests for Policy Transactions

features.evidence: Billing subsystem updates Payment Request generated for the Billing Period that includes Rescind Effective Date with Premium, Rate, Rate Basis, Number of Lives and Volume values as in the Master Policy's version that is about to be rescinded.

features.feature: Process Classification Group Changes
features.source_document: GRC_Billing/Billing/Billing Capabilities/Policy Transactions Capabilities/Classification group changes processing in Billing.md
features.evidence: Classification groups during policy life time may change and when it changes on member policy (Member Record) and it is premium bearing classification group it becomes updated in Billing domain. Billing creates a new modal premium version by setting up to 0 the previous modal premium version.

features.feature: Track Variance for Self-Bill Accounts

features.evidence: Track Variance feature is designed to identify and flag discrepancies in key data (Total Premium, Number of Lives, Volume) that surpass a pre-defined tolerance percentage limit. Billing Subsystem automatically generates a task for back-office User to investigate a specific Billing Account.

features.feature: Process Premium Waiver Transactions
features.source_document: GRC_Billing/Billing/Billing Implementation Requirements/Policy Transaction processing in Billing/Billing Roll-On Processing/UC_Billing Roll-On after Amendment.md
features.evidence: Billing subsystem finds future dated Claims Premium Waiver Add/Remove transaction. Billing subsystem does roll on of Claims Premium Waiver (add), Claims Premium Waiver Remove transactions roll on without a separate notification.

features.feature: Process Reduced Paid-Up and Extended-Term Transactions

features.evidence: RPU and ET transactions are regarded as Amendments with 'Stop Billing' flag: once received, BillingCore stops generating invoice items for the associated Member record and sets Modal Premium Amount to 0. Manual Reinstatement from RPU/ET allows user to resume billing and invoicing.

features.feature: Generate Business Activity Messages for Policy Transactions

features.evidence: BAM generated when Amendment for a Master Policy is processed. BAM should mention each Billing account on which amended Master Policy is billed. BAM status is FINISHED.

features.evidence: Created on Master Policy purchase and indicates what billing account(s) are associated with policy. For example if product is billed as list bill per location then each billing account selected for location during billing setup is represented in this list.

features.evidence: BAM generated when BillingCore successfully is fired business event of cancellation request. Cancellation request business event is fired for Member Record.

features.feature: Manage Product Structure in Billing
features.source_document: GRC_Billing/Billing/Billing Implementation Requirements/Policy Transaction processing in Billing/Integration with Policy Administration System (PAS) and processing of New Business Policy transactions/Full Admin Product Structure in Billing.md
features.evidence: The diagram describes the structure of Full Admin Product with Group category in Billing. Billing setup provides user with a view of all the products present in installation container and allows to manage billing settings for them.

features.evidence: Use case flow describes the update of Group Benefits List Bill/Individual Direct Member Record/Individual Policy when system intends to update one or more than one Member Records/Coverages in Billing domain. System positively validates the input (request) data.

features.feature: Manage Billing Cycle Frequency Configuration

features.feature: Calculate Paid-To-Date for Self-Bill Master Policies

features.feature: Calculate Amendments Not Yet Billed (ANYB) Balance
